translations: v．表示轻蔑或不屑一顾的声音，类似于“哼”或“呸”。
· He was poohing at the idea of going to the party.
他对去参加聚会的想法表示轻蔑。

phrs.translation: 小熊维尼（一卡通片名称）

sentences.sentence: Closer to his area of expertise, he is also pissed about scientists pooh-poohing cold fusion (or bubble fusion in the most recent case).
sentences.translation: 而在接近他的专业的领域，他也瞎扯说科学家们嘲笑冷聚变(或最近案例中的冷聚变)。
